description: Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP) For TASK Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) ...
full_summary:
```markdown
### Government of Canada Tender Announcement

#### Project Title: Junior Help Desk Specialist Services in Support of DMMS (MIS)

#### Solicitation Number: W8482-231044/A

#### Publication Date: December 14, 2022

#### Closing Date: January 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST

The Government of Canada is seeking proposals for Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) to support the Directorate of Maritime Management and Support - Management Information System (DMMS-MIS) of the Department of National Defence (DND).

#### Summary:

The requirement is for the provision of one (1) B.10 Junior (Level 1) Help Desk Specialist services, including:

*   Manage service requests, problems, and incidents
*   Support configuration and change management
*   Enable employee onboarding
*   Monitor reports and metrics for Professional Services

#### Overview:

This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirements of the Department of National Defence (DND) for the provision of Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS). The services will be provided to support the DMMS-MIS, with a proposed period of contract from Date of Contract Award to March 31, 2024, followed by three (3) option periods of one (1) year each.

#### Invitation to Bid:

This bid solicitation is open only to those Supply Arrangement Holders under EN578-170432 who qualified under "Tier 1" for the following category: B.10 Junior (Level 1) Help Desk Specialist.

#### Key Dates:

*   Closing date for Bids submission: January 19, 2023, 2:00 PM EST
*   Date of Contract Award: After the closing date
*   Proposed period of contract: From Date of Contract Award to March 31, 2024, followed by three (3) option periods of one (1) year each

#### Contact Information:

For further information, please contact:

*   Name: Daniel Guindon
*   Email: DMarP3BidSubmission-DOMar3Soumissiondesoffres@forces.gc.ca

#### Security Requirements:

Security Clearance Level: Common PS SRCL #6

#### Notice URL:

None
